content: single_crochet 133 chain 51 turn skip 1 chain stitch slip_stitch 50 back 7 single_crochet 133 chain 51 turn skip 1 chain stitch slip_stitch 50 back fasten_off weave in ends part three eyes make 2 1 using the kelly green yarn single_crochet 8 in magic_ring slip_stitch into 1st single_crochet chain 1 continue 2 single_crochet half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet increase single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet increase half_double_crochet increase single_crochet slip_stitch into 1st single_crochet of the round fasten_off kelly green yarn 3 attach bright yellow yarn to the back loop of where you left off with the kelly green yarn increase x 12 fasten_off bright yellow yarn with 24 long tail to use to sew in place on the red part of the caterpillar face part four antennae make 2 use purple yarn g or h hook 1 chain 10 skip 2 stitches half_double_crochet 7 half_double_crochet 4 stitches in the last remaining chain stitch continue on opposite side of the chain stitches half_double_crochet 7 back down 2 chain 1 slip_stitch along the center of the half_double_crochet stitches up to the rounded top and back down the other side as seen in pictures below demonstrated in white yarn fasten_off with 24 tail use the tail to stitch it in place page | 5 © 2017 megan lapp all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only the pattern or parts of
